googledrive part of the tidyverse
  • Reference

Reference version 0.0.0.9000

Authentication

Take explicit control of the Google auth status or examine current state

drive_auth

Authorize googledrive.

drive_deauth

Suspend authorization.

drive_user

Information on the user and user's Drive.

Reach out and touch your files

Retrieve metadata on your Drive files so you can act on them

drive_find

Find files on Google Drive.

drive_ls

List contents of a folder.

drive_get

Get Drive files by path or id

drive_add_path

Get paths to Drive files.

drive_browse

Visit Drive file in browser.

drive_view_trash

Get files in Drive Trash.

File creation and deletion

Create or delete Drive files and folders

drive_cp

Copy a Drive file.

drive_trash drive_untrash

Move files to or from trash.

drive_empty_trash

Empty Drive Trash.

drive_rm

Delete files from Drive.

drive_mkdir

Create a folder on Drive.

drive_mv

Move a Drive file.

drive_rename

Rename a Drive file

drive_upload

Upload into a new Drive file

drive_update

Update an existing Drive file

Upload and download

Create Drive files from local and vice versa

drive_upload

Upload into a new Drive file

drive_update

Update an existing Drive file

drive_download

Download a file from Drive.

Dribble object

Metadata about Drive files is stored in a “Drive tibble” a.k.a. a dribble

dribble object

as_dribble

Identify files on Google Drive

as_id

File id from string or URL.

is_dribble no_file single_file some_files confirm_single_file confirm_some_files is_folder is_mine

Check facts about a dribble

Share your files with the world

View or change the sharing and publishing status of Drive files

drive_publish

Publish Google Drive file.

drive_unpublish

Unpublish Google Drive file

drive_share

Update Google Drive file share permissions.

drive_is_published

Check if Google Drive file is published

drive_share_link

Retrieve a file's share link.

Drive API spec

Summon info about or check input against the Drive API spec

drive_endpoints

List Drive endpoints

drive_extension

Lookup extension from MIME type.

drive_fields prep_fields

Request partial resources

drive_mime_type

Lookup MIME type.

expose

An expose object.

Programming around the Drive API

Low-level functions used internally and made available for programming

generate_request build_request

Build a request for the Google Drive v3 API

make_request do_request do_paginated_request

Make a request for the Google Drive v3 API

process_response

Process a response from the Google Drive v3 API

drive_api_key

Get an API key

googledrive is a part of the tidyverse, an ecosystem of packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy. Learn more at tidyverse.org.
